I AND MY MOTHER HAVE AGREED TO OFFER YOU A NEGOTIABLE PERCENTAGE SO AS TO SEE THAT THIS PROJECT IS CONCLUDED SAFELY, SECURELY AND ON TIME CONSIDERING WHAT WE ARE PRESENTLY PASSING THROUGH.

OUR DESIRED INTEREST IS TO ESTABLISH A LONG AND LASTING RELATIONSHIP WITH YOU. AS WELL AS YOUR EXPERTISE UTILISATION OF THIS FUNDS FOR ANY MEANINGFUL/PROFITABLE INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITIES, AFTER THE MONEY HAS BEEN TRANSFERRED TO YOUR COUNTRY. MAY GOD BLESS YOU AND YOUR FAMILY FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING. I AWAITE YOUR IMMEDIATE RESPONSE PLEASE SO THAT WE CAN DISCUSS ON THE WAY FORWARD.

I CAN ALSO BE REACHED THROUGH ALTERNATIVE E-MAIL : mkazang@praize.com 

BEST REGARDS,
